quote.quotepara: From: Gurkan Erdogdu <gurkanerdogdu@yahoo.com> Subject: [INFO] FYI : Siwpas Application Server To: dev@openwebbeans.apache.org, dev@openejb.apache.org Date: Tuesday, April 19, 2011, 8:38 AM Hi,
